title: Universal Bayer
content:
Hey everyone /

looking for a font designed by Herbert Bayer in 1925.  
There are images of it everywhere in the internet,  
but i can’t find the source. No luck with fontshop,  
linotype or myfonts.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091127102647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bauhaus_text_4874.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091127102647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bayer_Type_Bauhaus_4675.png)

Anyone ?

Thanks,  
tt.
author: ttschense

comments.content:
I don’t think there’s an exact digitalisation of your specimen.  
But:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/victory/bayer-sans/bayer-sans/characters.ht...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091127102647/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/victory/bayer-sans/bayer-sans/characters.html "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/victory/bayer-sans/bayer-sans/characters.html")  
 [http://www.p22.com/products/typecaster.html#Bauhaus%20Set](http://web.archive.org/web/20091127102647/http:/www.p22.com/products/typecaster.html#Bauhaus%20Set "http://www.p22.com/products/typecaster.html#Bauhaus%20Set") (Bayer Universal)  
 [http://www.typedifferent.com/1995/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20091127102647/http:/www.typedifferent.com/1995/index.html "http://www.typedifferent.com/1995/index.html") (Plakatbau)

Hi Tobias,  
btw, Bayer did design a  
 [typeface, he didn’t make a font](http://web.archive.org/web/20091127102647/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/font-or-typeface/).  
F
Yet another version of Bayer’s Universal alphabet is Bob Newman’s Horatio. Linotype has it here [http://is.gd/52BCt](http://web.archive.org/web/20091127102647/http:/is.gd/52BCt "http://is.gd/52BCt")

thanks a lot !!!

Florian, da hast du natürlich recht!
